    // upload data to Amazon Kinesis every second if data exists
    setInterval(function() {
        if (!recordData.length) {
            return;
        }
        // upload data to Amazon Kinesis
        kinesis.putRecords({
            Records: recordData,
            StreamName: 'NAME_OF_STREAM'
        }, function(err, data) {
            if (err) {
                console.error(err);
            }
        });
        // clear record data
        recordData = [];
    }, 1000);
});
